name: Cozy Cleaning Bear
description:
Controls: 

* Spacebar - Vacuum Clutter/ Next Dialogue

* WASD keys - Movement

* J key - Fireball (must consume 3 pieces of clutter)

A cozy game where you clean a Wizard's house, blast enemies, dodge obstacles, get paid, and buy gifts for your Wife's birthday party.

My Entry for the #CozyAutumnGameJam2022
